text: After Jesus had finished teaching all this to the people, he entered Capernaum.

A <st data-num="1543">centurion</st><n id="1" /> there<n id="2" /> had a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739">who</st> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="1784">highly regarded</st>,<n id="4" /> but who <st data-num="2192">was</st> <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> and <st data-num="3195">at the point of</st> <st data-num="3195" class="">death</st>.

When the centurion<n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> some <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2065" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3704">to</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="1295" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>.

When<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, they <st data-num="3870" class="">urged</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4709" class="">earnestly</st>,<n id="4" /> “He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st><n id="5" /> to have you <st data-num="3930" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> for <st data-num="3739">him</st>

<st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846">even</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3618" class="">built</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. When<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="568">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3112" class="">far</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4660" class="">trouble</st> yourself,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">worthy</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> have you <st data-num="1525" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4721" class="">roof</st>!

<st data-num="1352">That is why</st><n id="1" /> I did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="515" class="">presume</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="3004">say</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servant</st> must be <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="5021" class="">set</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>, with <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">me</st>.<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this one</st>, ‘<st data-num="4198" class="">Go</st>!’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4198" class="">goes</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st>, ‘<st data-num="2064" class="">Come</st>!’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>, ‘<st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this!’</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> it.”<n id="3" />

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he was <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. He <st data-num="4762" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> that <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">not even</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> have I <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="5118" class="">such</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>!”<n id="2" />
So when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the slave well.
Soon afterward Jesus went to a town called Nain, and his disciples and a large crowd went with him.

<st data-num="5613" class="">As</st> he <st data-num="1448" class="">approached</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="4439" class="">gate</st>, a man<n id="1" /> who had <st data-num="2348" class="">died</st> was being <st data-num="1580">carried out</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3439" class="">only</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> (<st data-num="846" class="">who</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="5503">widow</st><n id="4" />), <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2425" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> from the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, he <st data-num="4697">had compassion</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weep</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4334">came up</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="681">touched</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="4673" class="">bier</st>,<n id="4" /> and those who <st data-num="941" class="">carried</st> it <st data-num="2476">stood still</st>. He<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3495">Young man</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1453">get up</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3498">dead man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="339">sat up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> Jesus<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> back<n id="4" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.

<st data-num="5401" class="">Fear</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">seized</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they began to <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “A <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st><n id="3" /> has <st data-num="1453" class="">appeared</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> “<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="1980">come to help</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>!”
This report about Jesus circulated throughout Judea and all the surrounding country.
John’s disciples informed him about all these things. So John called two of his disciples

and <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> them <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3004">ask</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1510">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the one who is to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> should we <st data-num="4328">look for</st> <st data-num="243">another</st>?”

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2491">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st> has <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="3004">ask</st>,<n id="3" /> ‘<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the one who is to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> should we <st data-num="4328">look for</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another?’</st>”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> very <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2323" class="">cured</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many people</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3554" class="">diseases</st>, <st data-num="3148" class="">sicknesses</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5483" class="">granted</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="991" class="">sight</st> to <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> who were <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4198">Go</st> <st data-num="518" class="">tell</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you have <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard:</st><n id="4" /> The <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="308" class="">see</st>, the <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st>, <st data-num="3015" class="">lepers</st><n id="5" /> are <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st>, the<n id="6" /> <st data-num="2974" class="">deaf</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>, the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> are <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>, the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st> have <st data-num="2097">good news proclaimed</st> to them.
Blessed is anyone who takes no offense at me.”
When John’s messengers had gone, Jesus began to speak to the crowds about John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken by the wind?

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st><n id="1" /> did you <st data-num="1831">go out</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>? A <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="294" class="">dressed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3120" class="">soft</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothing</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, those who <st data-num="1722" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="2441" class="">soft clothing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">live</st> in <st data-num="5172">luxury</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="934" class="">royal palaces</st>!<n id="4" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> did <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1831">go out</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st>? A <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>? <st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4053">more</st><n id="1" /> than a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>.
This is the one about whom it is written, ‘Look, I am sending my messenger ahead of you, who will prepare your way before you.’

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> those <st data-num="1084" class="">born</st> of <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st><n id="1" /> than <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161">Yet</st> the one who is <st data-num="3398">least</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> than <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> is.”

(<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1344" class="">acknowledged</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1344" class="">justice</st> because they had been <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st><n id="4" /> with <st data-num="2491">John’s</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st>.
However, the Pharisees and the experts in religious law rejected God’s purpose for themselves because they had not been baptized by John.)
“To what then should I compare the people of this generation, and what are they like?

They are like children sitting in the marketplace and calling out to one another,

“‘We played the flute for you, yet you did not dance;

we wailed in mourning, yet you did not weep.’
For John the Baptist has come eating no bread and drinking no wine, and you say, ‘He has a demon!’

The <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look at</st> <st data-num="444" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5314" class="">glutton</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3630" class="">drunk</st>, a <st data-num="5384" class="">friend</st> of <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268">sinners</st>!’<n id="2" />
But wisdom is vindicated by all her children.”
Now one of the Pharisees asked Jesus to have dinner with him, so he went into the Pharisee’s house and took his place at the table.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> when a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> of that <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st>, <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="268" class="">sinner</st>, <st data-num="1921" class="">learned</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> Jesus<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="2621" class="">dining</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="5330">Pharisee’s</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, she <st data-num="2865" class="">brought</st> an <st data-num="211">alabaster jar</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="3464">perfumed oil</st>.<n id="5" />

As<n id="1" /> she <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3694" class="">behind</st> him <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>, she <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="1026" class="">wet</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> with her <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>. She<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1591" class="">wiped</st> them with <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2705" class="">kissed</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4228" class="">them</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="218" class="">anointed</st><n id="7" /> them with the <st data-num="3464">perfumed oil</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> when the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st> who had <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> this,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>,<n id="2" /> he would <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101">who</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4217">what kind of</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st><n id="3" /> this is <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="681">touching</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> she <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="268" class="">sinner</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4613">Simon</st>, I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100">something</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.” He <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="3004" class="">Say</st> it, <st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st>.”

“A <st data-num="5100" class="">certain</st> <st data-num="1157" class="">creditor</st><n id="1" /> had <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5533" class="">debtors;</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">owed</st> him<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4001">500</st> <st data-num="1220">silver coins</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4004" class="">50</st>.

When <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2192">could</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="591" class="">pay</st>, he <st data-num="5483" class="">canceled<n id="1" /> the debts</st> of <st data-num="297" class="">both</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="5101">which</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> will <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">more</st>?”

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="5274" class="">suppose</st> the one <st data-num="3739">who</st> had the <st data-num="4183">bigger</st> <st data-num="5483">debt canceled</st>.”<n id="2" /> Jesus<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You have <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="3723" class="">rightly</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4762" class="">turning</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, he <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, “Do you <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>? I <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>. You <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3778">she</st> has <st data-num="1026" class="">wet</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> with her <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1591" class="">wiped</st> them with <st data-num="846">her</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st>.

You <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5370" class="">kiss</st> of greeting,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739">the time</st> I <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> she has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1257" class="">stopped</st> <st data-num="2705" class="">kissing</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

You did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="218" class="">anoint</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> with <st data-num="1637">oil</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> she has <st data-num="218" class="">anointed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> with <st data-num="3464">perfumed oil</st>.

<st data-num="5484">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>, which were <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>, are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>, <st data-num="3754">thus</st> she <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much;</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the one <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st> <st data-num="3641" class="">little</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="3641" class="">little</st>.”

<st data-num="1161">Then</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="4771">Your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> those who <st data-num="4873">were at the table<n id="2" /> with</st> him <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="863" class="">forgives</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>?”
He said to the woman, “Your faith has saved you; go in peace.”
